comment: Galaxy Fold problem me and my husband have a galaxy. Fold4, and both of them are having problems with TikTok. The screen will load half of the screen and the other side be black. Also, the comments are always off , With this new update, please fix this now. I know our phones are new so it has nothing to do it .
scenarios: On the Galaxy Fold4, the TikTok screen loads only half of the screen, while the other side remains black.
On the Galaxy Fold4, the comments feature is always off.
key sentence: On the Galaxy Fold4, the comments feature is always off.
the function of activity: This activity involves various tasks such as searching for contacts, playing, pausing, liking, sharing, and reporting videos, as well as managing user profiles and interactions(following list, follower, like,favorites,private,draft).
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Comment on Video', 'description': 'Add a comment to the video'}, {'name': 'View the comments', 'description': 'View the comments of vedio'}]
